    • Method Detail

      • loadTextFile

        public static java.lang.String loadTextFile(java.lang.String textFile)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        This method loads the complete contents of the textFile argument into a String and returns it.
        Parameters:
        textFile - The name of the text file to load. Note that the path will be added by this method.
        Returns:
        All the contents of the text file in a single String.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - This exception is thrown when textFile is an invalid file or there is some problem in accessing the file.
